title: Ticket #5892: Condor_q man page should note when -batch became the default
description:
The condor_q man page notes when displaying only the current user's jobs became the default, but it doesn't note when -batch became the default.

Maybe also include something about this: https://htcondor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/wiki?p=ExperimentalCustomPrintFormats
remarks:
2016-Sep-09 16:56:27 by wenger:
Also fix up examples for -batch being the default...

2016-Sep-13 10:35:57 by wenger:
Also see #5825.

A lot of the condor_q man page is now incorrect because of batch mode being the default.

2016-Sep-14 16:32:17 by wenger:
Tim, can't this be 8.5.7? It's only doc changes, and I thought the doc window was still open for 8.5.7...

2016-Sep-14 22:04:15 by tim:
Sure, this can go into 8.5.7. I was just moving tickets with no commits to 8.5.8. Any documentation tickets that you want to move back to 8.5.7 are OK.

2016-Sep-15 12:47:30 by wenger:
Note: I've ended up making a ton of changes to the condor_q man page -- the more I look, the more outdated/incorrect/missing stuff (lots of things need to be changed for batch mode, -grid is totally missing, etc.).

I also added a lot of explanation about what batches are, and reorganized things to hopefully be clearer...

Also, I want to have Lauren and Christina review this once it's done.

2016-Sep-15 16:48:57 by wenger:
I'm going to resolve this ticket (now that I've addressed the actual subject of the ticket), and continue with changes to the condor_q man page under #5825.

Note that today's commit included a ton of stuff besides just adding a note about when -batch became the default...
check_ins: 2016-Sep-15 16:43   Check-in [49208]: Gittrac #5892: Added notes about when -batch became the default for condor_q. Also did a lot of fixing up of the man page -- tons of stuff was outdated because of batch mode, and there were lots of other problems. (Also see #5825.) (Note that fixes are not complete -- see TEMP comments.) (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
